description: When searching for the right candidate to fill a job, we often focus on the applicant’s work experience and level of education. Sometimes it is all about who they know or who referred them. But what we should really focus on is the candidate’s skills. This major will describe certain skills employers want in every candidate, no matter what role they will fill. From entry-level workers to executives, every employee should possess these personal skills in order to succeed and help your company move forward.
